decision_conditions: Condition 42 which reads: Notwithstanding any materials specified in the application, details and samples of materials proposed to be used on all external surfaces of the development in a Development Plot or Phase shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority before any installation of such materials in that Detailed or Outline Phase.In addition the developer shall display the sample materials on a 'mock-up' of each phase, the details of the mock-up to be agreed with the local planning authority.The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: In order to assess the suitability of the proposed materials, in the interests of the appearance of the locality.Is replaced with: 42 A) Notwithstanding any materials specified in the application, details of any bricks to be used in any Development Plot or Phase shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority before the installation of any bricks in that Detailed or Outline Phase.The developer shall display the sample materials of the proposed bricks on a 'mock-up' of each phase, the details of the mock-up to be agreed with the local planning authority. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.B) Notwithstanding any materials specified in the application details and/or samples of all other facing materials (except bricks) to be used  in a Development Plot or Phase shall be submitted to and approved by the local planning authority before any installation of such materials in that Detailed or Outline Phase. The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.Reason: In order to assess the suitability of the proposed materials, in the interests of the appearance of the locality.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/02942/FUL. Amendment to wording of condition 42
